Articles.Content:
I decided to post this one here. It gets a max altitude of 9561, a max speed of about 300 m/s, and I covered about 200,000 m before it runs out of fuel.

When you get it on the runway lock the sas until the first fuel tank runs out, then turn it up

Either way, download and try for yourself.

Edited September 11, 2012 by Colderjake1524
Nice, it kind of looks like those old 1930's style racing airplanes with the blunt nose! Thomford looks like he's not having as much fun as he should be though.
nice plane haven't gotten it into space yet, but keep up the good work
